title: The Coasters - The Very Best Of@320
description:
This is not only the definitive Coasters greatest hits album, it&#039;s also a de facto best of Leiber and Stoller, the two legendary songwriter/producers responsible for all the songs here. Interestingly, Leiber says in the liner notes that his primary songwriting inspiration was radio plays.
For example, the sound effects on "Riot in Cell Block #9" were inspired by GANGBUSTERS, a popular crime series of the early &#039;50s. This music is some of the 
best first-generation rock &#039;n&#039; roll, with each comedic track brilliantly sung. Anybody who thought early rock was illiterate and a-musical obviously never listened to these songs.



01. The Robins - Riot In Cell Block #9                                                                                  
02. The Robins - Smokey Joe&#039;s Cafe                                                                                      
03. The Coasters - Down In Mexico                                                                                      
04. The Coasters - Searchin&#039;                                                                                            
05. The Coasters - Idol With The Golden Head                                                                            
06. The Coasters - Young Blood                                                                                          
07. The Coasters - Yakety Yak                                                                                          
08. The Coasters - Charlie Brown                                                                                        
09. The Coasters - Along Came Jones                                                                                    
10. The Coasters - That Is Rock &#039;n&#039; Roll                                                                                
11. The Coasters - I&#039;m A Hog For You                                                                                    
12. The Coasters - Poison Ivy                                                                                          
13. The Coasters - What About Us                                                                                        
14. The Coasters - Run Red Run                                                                                          
15. The Coasters - Little Egypt                                                                                        
16. The Coasters - Shoppin&#039; For Clothes                                                                                
17. The Coasters - Sorry But I&#039;m Gonna Pass



The Coasters include: Carl Gardner, Bobby Nunn, Leon Hughes, Billy Guy, Obie "Young" Jessie, Cornell Gunter, Will "Dub" Jones, Earl "Speedo" Carroll.


Producers: Jerry Leiber, Mike Stoller.
Compilation producer: Gary Stewart.
Includes liner notes by Randy Poe, Jerry Leiber and Mike Stoller.
Digitally remastered by Bill Inglot and Dan Hersch


Label: Atlantic/Rhino
Orig Year: 1994  

BITRATE: 320
